# Subete Sushi

> Fresh, authentic Japanese sushi restaurant in Göteborg, Sweden. Handcrafted sushi, nigiri, maki rolls, and poke bowls at Lisebergsstation.

## About

Subete Sushi is a Japanese restaurant specializing in fresh, handcrafted sushi located in Göteborg, Sweden. We are situated at Lisebergsstation, making us easily accessible by public transport and just a short walk from Liseberg amusement park.

Our menu features traditional Japanese cuisine including:
- Nigiri and Maki sushi
- Flambéed (flame-seared) Nigiri
- Poke Bowls
- Special Makimono Rolls
- Japanese Hot Dishes
- Appetizers

We pride ourselves on using premium, fresh ingredients and traditional Japanese preparation methods.

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://subetesushi.se
- **Phone**: +46 31-352 11 10
- **Address**: Fabriksgatan 60, Lisebergsstation, 412 51 Göteborg, Sweden
- **GPS Coordinates**: 57.69834, 11.99463

## Opening Hours

| Day | Hours |
|-----|-------|
| Monday | Closed |
| Tuesday | 12:00 - 22:00 |
| Wednesday | 12:00 - 22:00 |
| Thursday | 12:00 - 22:00 |
| Friday | 12:00 - 23:00 |
| Saturday | 14:00 - 23:00 |
| Sunday | 14:00 - 22:00 |

## Services

- Dine-in
- Takeaway
- Reservations accepted (recommended for weekends)

## Payment Methods

- Cash
- Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard)
- Swish

## Dietary Information

- Vegetarian options available (vegetable maki, vegetarian poke bowls)
- Please inform staff about food allergies when ordering
- Menu contains: fish, shellfish, soy, sesame, gluten

## Social Media

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/subete_sushi
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/subetesushi/

## Price Range

$$ (Moderate)

## Languages

- Swedish
- English

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Do you offer takeaway?
Yes, we offer both dine-in and takeaway. Call 031-3521110 to place your order.

### Do I need a reservation?
Reservations are recommended for weekends and larger groups. Call 031-3521110 to book.

### Is parking available?
Street parking is available nearby. We are also easily accessible by tram at Lisebergsstation.

### Do you cater for events?
Please contact us directly at 031-3521110 for catering inquiries.
